name: SliverOverlapAbsorber
info: Wraps another sliver and forces its layout extent to be treated as overlapping. Needs to be used in conjunction with SliverOverlapInjector.

nodes.name: Basic Usage of SliverOverlapAbsorber
desc: If the SliverOverlapAbsorber and SliverOverlapInjector components are not used, the content of the NestedScrollView will overlap with the header bar.
